column2: we can handle that. Make sure you stay away from the items that are starred on the menu. They either contain soy sauce or are fried in a shared frier. Also
column3: we clean all the knives and utensils used for your food before we start cooking. Also
column4: the fries are made in their own frier
column5: but it is next to the regular frier so while we try to keep them separate
column6: it is up to you if you are comfortable eating them.
